percent_rural.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_rural.description: Percentage of population living in a rural area.

percent_females.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_females.description: Percentage of population that is female.

percent_not_proficient_in_english.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_not_proficient_in_english.description: Percentage of population that is not proficient in English.

percent_non_hispanic_white.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_non_hispanic_white.description: Percentage of population self-identifying as non-Hispanic white.

percent_hispanic.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_hispanic.description: Percentage of population self-identifying as Hispanic.

percent_native_hawaiian_other_pacific_is.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_native_hawaiian_other_pacific_is.description: Percentage of population self-identifying as Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander.

percent_asian.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_asian.description: Percentage of population self-identifying as Asian.

percent_american_indian_alaska_native.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_american_indian_alaska_native.description: Percentage of population self-identifying as American Indian or Alaska Native.

percent_non_hispanic_black.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_non_hispanic_black.description: Percentage of population self-identifying as non-Hispanic Black or African American.

percent_65_and_older.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_65_and_older.description: Percentage of population ages 65 and older.

percent_below_18_years_of_age.title: Percentage (x100)
percent_below_18_years_of_age.description: Percentage of population below 18 years of age.

severe_housing_cost_burden.title: Percentage (x100)
severe_housing_cost_burden.description: Percentage of households that spend 50% or more of their household income on housing.

traffic_volume.title: (vehicles/meter)
traffic_volume.description: Average traffic volume per meter of major roadways in the county.

children_eligible_for_free_or_reduced_pr.title: Percentage (x100)
children_eligible_for_free_or_reduced_pr.description: Percentage of children enrolled in public schools that are eligible for free or reduced price lunch.

median_household_income.title: (USD)
median_household_income.description: The income where half of households in a county earn more and half of households earn less.

other_primary_care_providers.title: per 100,000
other_primary_care_providers.description: Number of other primary care providers per 100,000 population

uninsured_children.title: uninsured_adults
uninsured_children.description: Percentage of children under age 19 without health insurance.

uninsured_adults.title: uninsured_adults
uninsured_adults.description: Percentage of adults under age 65 without health insurance.

insufficient_sleep.title: Percentage (x100)
insufficient_sleep.description: Percentage of adults who report fewer than 7 hours of sleep on average.

limited_access_to_healthy_foods.title: Percentage (x100)
limited_access_to_healthy_foods.description: Percentage of population who are low-income and do not live close to a grocery store.

food_insecurity.title: Percentage (x100)
food_insecurity.description: Percentage of population who lack adequate access to food.

diabetes_prevalence.title: Percentage (x100)
diabetes_prevalence.description: Percentage of adults aged 20 and above with diagnosed diabetes (age-adjusted).

frequent_mental_distress.title: Percentage (x100)
frequent_mental_distress.description: Percentage of adults reporting 14 or more days of poor mental health per month (age-adjusted).

frequent_physical_distress.title: Percentage (x100)
frequent_physical_distress.description: Percentage of adults reporting 14 or more days of poor physical health per month (age-adjusted).

premature_age_adjusted_mortality.title: per 100,000
premature_age_adjusted_mortality.description: Number of deaths among residents under age 75 per 100,000 population (age-adjusted).

life_expectancy.title: (years)
life_expectancy.description: Average number of years a person can expect to live.

long_commute_driving_alone.title: Percentage (x100)
long_commute_driving_alone.description: Among workers who commute in their car alone, the percentage that commute more than 30 minutes.

driving_alone_to_work.title: Percentage (x100)
driving_alone_to_work.description: Percentage of the workforce that drives alone to work.

severe_housing_problems.title: Percentage (x100)
severe_housing_problems.description: Percentage of households with at least 1 of 4 housing problems: overcrowding, high housing costs, lack of kitchen facilities, or lack of plumbing facilities.

drinking_water_violations.title: Violation Indicator (0/1)
drinking_water_violations.description: Indicator of the presence of health-related drinking water violations. 0=No, 1=Yes

air_pollution_particulate_matter.title: PM2.5 Concentration (µg/m³)
air_pollution_particulate_matter.description: Average daily density of fine particulate matter in micrograms per cubic meter (PM2.5).

injury_deaths.title: per 100,000
injury_deaths.description: Number of deaths due to injury per 100,000 population.

violent_crime.title: per 100,000
violent_crime.description: Number of reported violent crime offenses per 100,000 population.

social_associations.title: per 100,000
social_associations.description: Number of membership associations per 10,000 population.

children_in_single_parent_households.title: Percentage (x100)
children_in_single_parent_households.description: Percentage of children that live in a household headed by a single parent.

income_inequality.title: Ratio (80th/20th)
income_inequality.description: Ratio of household income at the 80th percentile to income at the 20th percentile.

children_in_poverty.title: Percentage (x100)
children_in_poverty.description: Percentage of people under age 18 in poverty.

unemployment.title: Percentage (x100)
unemployment.description: Percentage of population ages 16 and older unemployed but seeking work.

some_college.title: Percentage (x100)
some_college.description: Percentage of adults ages 25-44 with some post-secondary education.

high_school_graduation.title: Percentage (x100)
high_school_graduation.description: Percentage of adults ages 25 and over with a high school diploma or equivalent.

flu_vaccinations.title: Percentage (x100)
flu_vaccinations.description: Percentage of fee-for-service (FFS) Medicare enrollees that had an annual flu vaccination.

mammography_screening.title: Percentage (x100)
mammography_screening.description: Percentage of female Medicare enrollees ages 65-74 that received an annual mammography screening.

preventable_hospital_stays.title: per 100,000
preventable_hospital_stays.description: Rate of hospital stays for ambulatory-care sensitive conditions per 100,000 Medicare enrollees.

mental_health_providers.title: per 100,000
mental_health_providers.description: Number of mental health care providers per 100,000 population

primary_care_physicians.title: Rate per 100,000
primary_care_physicians.description: Number of primary care physicians per 100,000 population

uninsured.title: Percentage (x100)
uninsured.description: Percentage of population under age 65 without health insurance.

teen_births.title: per 1,000
teen_births.description: Number of births per 1,000 female population ages 15-19.

sexually_transmitted_infections.title: per 100,000
sexually_transmitted_infections.description: Number of newly diagnosed chlamydia cases per 100,000 population.

alcohol_impaired_driving_deaths.title: Percentage (x100)
alcohol_impaired_driving_deaths.description: Percentage of driving deaths with alcohol involvement.

excessive_drinking.title: Percentage (x100)
excessive_drinking.description: Percentage of adults reporting binge or heavy drinking (age-adjusted).

access_to_exercise_opportunities.title: Percentage (x100)
access_to_exercise_opportunities.description: Percentage of population with adequate access to locations for physical activity.

physical_inactivity.title: Percentage (x100)
physical_inactivity.description: Percentage of adults age 18 and over reporting no leisure-time physical activity (age-adjusted).

food_environment_index.title: Food Environment Index (0-10)
food_environment_index.description: Index of factors that contribute to a healthy food environment, from 0 (worst) to 10 (best).

adult_obesity.title: Percentage (x100)
adult_obesity.description: Percentage of the adult population (age 18 and older) that reports a body mass index (BMI) greater than or equal to 30 kg/m2 (age-adjusted).

adult_smoking.title: Percentage (x100)
adult_smoking.description: Percentage of adults who are current smokers (age-adjusted).

low_birthweight.title: Percentage (x100)
low_birthweight.description: Percentage of live births with low birthweight (< 2,500 grams).

poor_mental_health_days.title: Days
poor_mental_health_days.description: Average number of mentally unhealthy days reported in past 30 days (age-adjusted).

poor_physical_health_days.title: Days
poor_physical_health_days.description: Average number of physically unhealthy days reported in past 30 days (age-adjusted).

poor_or_fair_health.title: Percentage (x100)
poor_or_fair_health.description: Percentage of adults reporting fair or poor health (age-adjusted).

premature_death.title: Year
premature_death.description: Years of potential life lost before age 75 per 100,000 population (age-adjusted).
